name: PastFish
author: pastleo
full_description:
> pastfish theme for [Oh My Fish][omf-link]. ## Install ```fish $ omf u pastfish ``` ## Features * Random greeting message * Command prompts colored based on time (morning is blue, afternoon is green, midnight is red ...) * The `>` at the end of each prompt will turn yellow if the git repo is dirty, red if current location is not writable ## Screenshot
